tasks.title: Fix Voyc crash on startup (Gdk Error 71 regression)
notes: 2026-01-29 00:20:14 UTC: T032 workaround not working. App crashes ~400ms after 'Application setup complete' with 'Error 71 (Protocol error) dispatching to Wayland display'. Previous attempt deferred always_on_top but issue persists. Need to research Tauri 2.0 Wayland compatibility and compare with working Handy implementation.

[COMPLETED 2026-01-29T00:31:38Z] Fixed Wayland crash (Gdk Error 71) by adding __NV_DISABLE_EXPLICIT_SYNC=1 env var for NVIDIA+Wayland systems in main.rs. Reverted unnecessary T032 overlay changes. Root cause: WebKitGTK/NVIDIA explicit sync protocol incompatibility (tauri-apps/tauri#10702). App now runs stably on Wayland.
[COMPLETED 2026-01-29T01:16:17Z] Fixed: Added __NV_DISABLE_EXPLICIT_SYNC=1 in main.rs per tauri issue #10702

tasks.title: Implement Wayland/GNOME global shortcut workaround
tasks.description: GNOME on Wayland doesn't deliver global shortcut events via xdg-desktop-portal. Need to either: 1) Force X11 backend on GNOME, 2) Use GNOME-specific D-Bus shortcut API, or 3) Implement alternative activation method.
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-01-29T20:35:26Z] Superseded by T056 - native Wayland shortcuts implemented using ashpd crate

tasks.title: Testing and Bug Fixing Epic - comprehensive Voyc functionality testing
Test hotkey registration and dictation trigger on GNOME/Wayland
notes: [COMPLETED 2026-01-29T23:23:05Z] Investigated hotkey registration on GNOME/Wayland. Root cause: XDG Desktop Portal GlobalShortcuts requires WindowIdentifier for permission dialog, which needs xdg-foreign protocol. On pure Wayland, users must manually configure shortcuts in GNOME Settings > Keyboard > Shortcuts. Added improved logging, frontend events, and open_shortcut_settings command.

tasks.title: Test full dictation flow: record -> transcribe -> text injection
